mapper.select: SELECT e.`name` FROM a_account a JOIN a_role_resource_relation r ON a.roleid=r.roleid JOIN a_resource e ON r.resourceid = e.id WHERE a.account=#{account}
select t3.* from a_account t1 inner join a_role_resource_relation t2 on t1.roleid = t2.roleid inner join a_resource t3 on t2.resourceid = t3.id where t1.account = #{account}
